review: Love this device ... It saved me money for a new consule(my second xbox died & I only used it for streaming) instead of buying a new one I just bought this. It has no problem with Hulu, Netflix , and it all ready detected my amazon prime info. Remote is easy to use. Only had a small problem when I was plugging in the power. since I ran everything thru the wall, Cable it came with was just a bit shorter than what I needed. But thats my problem not the products faultTo sum it up I love it ...
author: Another User

review: I wish I would have purchased this item when it became available.  Easy to set up and easy to use.  I have joined Amazon Prime, and get extra free movies.  Those which are not free are very affordable.  Each time I use the Fire Stick I learn more about the set-up and see more of what is available thru this device, which is plenty.  Free shipping on all Amazon Prime products, a great deal.  I receive e-mails telling me what movies have been added to the free watching.  I highly recommend this product.
